name: Dreamlit Hearth

desc.0: Its origin cannot be dated, its craftsmanship beyond record. From appearance alone, it seems to be a relic of the old capital, preserved to this day by the Ether burning within its core.
desc.1: Many years later, the river washed it ashore on a shallow bank, where a young girl picked up the finely crafted toy. From then on, it stood in for her lost family, keeping her company each night, offering a small light in the dark.
desc.3: <ct color=#959595>"Yeah, it's a super great night-light!" â€”That's what Lucia said when asked.</ct>
